#################################################

Release Name:
FATE.The.Cursed.King-WWW

Release Type: PC Game
Game: FATE The Cursed King
Language: English
 
#################################################

System Requirements:
	Processor: Pentium 3 - 800MHz or better
	Video Card RAM: 32MB, 3D hardware acceleration required
	DirectX Version: 8.1 or above
	RAM: 256 MB for XP, 512 MB for Vista
	Operating System: Windows 8, Windows 7, Vista and XP

#################################################

How to install:
1. Mount FATE_TCK.iso
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

The bestselling FATE series returns with a brand new chapter! As the hero of FATE: The Cursed King, play through an exotic new realm full of surprises. Fight your way through vast and varied dungeons on your quest to break the terrible curse that threatens your home. Customize your skills completely between magic and melee, and recruit AI-controlled allies to fight beside you! Brand new to the game is a party system, plenty of weapons, spells, and armor. Will you break the curse, or will the city of Ekbatan be forever doomed?

Release Notes:

To customize your resolution, open config.dat (located in %ProgramData%WildTangentFateCursedKingPersistent ) in a text editor and edit SCREENWIDTH:800 SCREENHEIGHT:600 to equal your monitor's supported resolution. Don't worry, as Fate can run on almost any custom resolution. (Got a 1920x1080 screen? Use it!)

#################################################

FAQs
Q: Is this the full game?
A: Yes.

Q: Does this require the cd to play?
A: No.

Q: Does this require Steam?
A: No.

Q: Do I need an unlock code?
A: No.

Q: Do I need any of the WildTangent Games platform crap?
A: No.

Q: Is this multilingual?
A: No. English is the only language supported.

A: Buy me a Mac and I'll figure it out.

A: No.

Q: Is this version moddable?
A: Yes.

Q: Will you marry me?
A: No.
